description: Spice Kitchen is a fine dining restaurant offering a blend of traditional and contemporary Indian cuisine. Located in the heart of Janpath, it promises a culinary experience like no other.
Sky Lounge is a rooftop restaurant offering panoramic views of Connaught Place. Enjoy a selection of global cuisines and signature cocktails in a stylish and sophisticated setting.
Royal Feast is a luxurious dining destination known for its exquisite ambiance and delectable multi-cuisine offerings. Indulge in a culinary journey fit for royalty.
Chilli Fusion offers a fusion of Indian and Chinese flavors in a contemporary setting. Experience bold and vibrant dishes prepared with the freshest ingredients.
Green Garden offers a serene dining experience amidst lush greenery. Savor fresh and flavorful dishes inspired by nature's bounty.
Golden Gate is a family-friendly restaurant known for its warm hospitality and diverse menu. Enjoy a delightful culinary experience with your loved ones.
Sunset Bistro offers a charming outdoor dining experience with a view of the setting sun. Relish a variety of gourmet dishes crafted with passion and creativity.
Spring Blossom is a hidden gem in Vasant Vihar, offering a delightful fusion of Asian flavors. Immerse yourself in a culinary journey filled with freshness and creativity.
Flavors of India is a celebration of authentic Indian cuisine, featuring a diverse array of regional specialties. Experience the rich and vibrant flavors of India.
Leela's Delight is an elegant dining destination offering a curated menu of international delicacies. Indulge in a luxurious dining experience at Leela's.
Taste of Punjab is a culinary journey through the flavors of North India. Savor authentic Punjabi cuisine in a vibrant and welcoming ambiance.
Mughal Palace offers a regal dining experience reminiscent of the grandeur of the Mughal era. Explore a menu of royal delicacies fit for kings and queens.
